if (NOT EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp)
  message("calling git clone osqp")
  execute_process(COMMAND git clone --branch release-0.5.0 --recursive https://github.com/oxfordcontrol/osqp ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp)
  execute_process(COMMAND cmake -E chdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp mkdir build)
  execute_process(COMMAND cmake -E chdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp/build cmake ..)
  execute_process(COMMAND cmake -E chdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp/build make install)
  message("cmake osqp")
endif()
if (NOT EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp-eigen)
  message("calling git clone osqp-eigen")
  execute_process(COMMAND git clone --recursive https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen.git ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp-eigen)
  execute_process(COMMAND cmake -E chdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp-eigen mkdir build)
  execute_process(COMMAND cmake -E chdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp-eigen/build cmake ..)
  execute_process(COMMAND cmake -E chdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/osqp-eigen/build make install)
  message("cmake osqp-eigen")
endif()
